All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Cluster
A Miranda cluster A group of nodes exchanging heart beet messages.
ClusterConnectionStates
A cluster connection state A cluster connection exists in one of a limited number of states (see package documentation) in which it can only receive a subset of messages.
ClusterHandler
A connection to another node in the cluster This class implements the Cluster protocol (see the package documentation).
Grep
 
LoggingCache
An object that records objects as they come into the class, keeps a portion of those objects in memory, and recovers itself when asked.
LoggingMap
A map that logs all its items to a file
